UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: The zebrafish embryo as a tool for screening and characterizing pleurocidin host-defense peptides as anti-cancer agents.
Literature.Author: Morash MG, Douglas SE, Robotham A, Ridley CM, Gallant JW, Soanes KH

Literature.Title: Novel antimicrobial peptides derived from flatfish genes.

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=>256 µg/ml,Zebrafish embryos:0% Killing=25 µM
